title: Accidentally disenchanted Project: Fiora Skin while crafting.
body:
Hello, I'm hoping a Riot employee will see this and maybe help me out...

I received a Project Fiora skin shard from the Project event a few weeks ago. I was disenchanting other skin shards to create enough orange essence to upgrade to permanent. I mistakenly disenchanted the skin rather than upgrading it. Is there any possible way to retrieve this please!!!

replies.body: It's a bummer when I hear that a skin shard was accidentally disenchanted, especially if it's a unique one like Hextech Annie.  I can't make any guarantees for you because there are confirmation windows before proceeding with an action, but you can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll look into your specific issue with Project Fiora, but again I can't make a guarantee here.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
Thanks for the response. I'll submit a ticket and hope for the best!
I did the same with my Snow day malzahar skin and i desperately need help wish they had an option to recover shards after accidental disenchants
